duties_responsibilities.duty: Own & support daily initiatives in all Factor Distribution across the Chicago Area.
Coordinate and host Monthly Engagement Events for both hourly and exempt populations.
Launch & manage current Recognition Programs and help develop and rollout out new initiatives in partnership with local site operations and HR teams.
Build and streamline local site programs to support an inclusive environment promoting effective and engaging two-way communication.
Assess the effectiveness of programs for continuous improvement and propose/build solutions to meet employee's diverse needs.
Work directly with employees to collect feedback and find local ways to improve the culture.
Foster strong partnerships cross-functionally and work closely with Operations teams to support them in owning and improving the employee experience on their teams.
Partner with the local HR team to ensure all processes operate efficiently and effectively.
Support on ad hoc projects from the Human Resources or Operations Team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in HR, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
